long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension provides some minor changes to VK' design: 

 - ads kill
 - paddings reducing
 - round icons vs square icons
 - etc

This is an open-source project, he's living on the GitHub: https://github.com/dhilt/vk-markup-crash. Please contribute if you can/want, any participation is welcome.
